svg.style: font-family: 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 18px; background-color: white; text-rendering: optimizeLegibility; -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased;

text.tspan: Share of global cumulative CO₂ emissions
Each country or region's share of cumulative global carbon dioxide (CO₂) emissions. Cumulative emissions are
calculated as the sum of annuals emissions from 1751 to a given year.
Source: Our World in Data based on Global Carbon Project (GCP)
